name: Dark Deception FanGame:TORMENT THERAPY
description:
Description

Dark Deception-Torment Therapy is a fangame based on both "Dark Deception

Dark Deception Steam link：https://store.steampowered.com/app/332950/Dark_Deception/

Hi!Welcome to Torment Therapy Fangame!Bierce is inviting you to visit the  hospital.There’s only one ‘Patient’,you. it only has some ‘Reaper Nurses’.It moves a bit faster than your usual speed.Then Malak will move the ring piece to a mysterious place.Where is it?Hope you’ll find it!

Switch English

In the main menu, click“选项”
